quote_last: on that self-same Friday, 20 June, seventy-two hours before his disappearance, Adria Daedalus Sorra, man-about-town, disc jockey and student of philosophy, careened up the stairs with his skateboard.
title: The Serpent Papers
author: Jessica Cornwell

quote_last: “Don’t shoot,” Isaac Mannheim shouted as he saw the unshaven, barefoot man roll next to him, an Uzi giving off bursts of rounds.
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover
